title: Repeated "Did not receive a response from server" messages....can't log in! Please help!
body: Hey there! I need some help! I was playing League totally fine Monday night and such, but the next morning my PC was acting all funky. Whatever. Turned it in to a friend and he fixed it (something wrong with a RAM stick, I believe). Anyway, when I got it back from him, my League client repeatedly sends me these messages when I attempt to log in....I have tried every mentioned method out there to fix this. Coding, deleting cache and history, adjusting Internet settings. Nothing works. I even uninstalled/reinstalled League, but to no avail. Any ideas?

replies.body:
Hey NJDUNKIN1, 

If you have tried repairing and your client still isn't working, I think it's time for you to have Riot's tech team look into the matter for you. Don't need anything else messed up :) https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

That will get you where you need to go

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}
Sounds good man, I filed a help ticket a few hours ago. Fingers crossed {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
It's not the internet lol...Google Chrome has no issues for me.
